bow: why do people continue to have children if they have expressed distress over the initial ones realize the title comes off as extremely judgemental but have sincerely been wondering about this and well ca really ask anyone in real life have ton of friends and acquaintances who non stop complain their finances hating being parent talking about their severe mental and physical health issues talking about divorcing their spouse etc understand that people vent but they also rarely say anything positive then they announce they re pregnant again are there really that many this will fix things babies or what is going on that actually really great question haha thank you was apprehensive to post this what another one they are beautiful to love and it won make all the losses of parenthood worse we struggled with our first we were isolated and had no support with difficult baby probably someone that you are talking about complaining about parenting also feel we do ourselves and fellow parents disservice when we minimise the impacts of parenting on us as people not going to sit around and pretend my life with children is all love sunshine and rainbows because it not wonder the same thing everyone says the first three months are the hardest and am hoping that true because right now hate being parent miss eating hot meals and sleeping and doing whatever want but my little girl started smiling at me and cooing and it so cute when she is not screaming in my ear are we sure it intentional birth control slipups happen ever hear the expression kids give your life the highest of highs and lowest of lows also maybe some people cinsider the sacrifice worth it to give their kid sibling with that being said one and done lool removed it is true promise my year old os currently cutting teeth at once he is clingy and whining constantly he wakes up from tooth pain at least once night and has boycotted naps for the time being it is nothing compared to those first months think my brain blocked some of it out for self preservation but the level of exhaustion is so much less now than it was then agreed had to remove myself from social media almost entirely year into being mom could take all the pressure to be the perfect mom family and it just was healthy for me to be bombarded with supposed perfect families we have awesome days in our house but we also have days just want to lock myself in the bathroom and pretend do have kid thankfully her grandparents moved closer around the 18 mo mark so they take her off our hands about once week now so we can recover our sanity but not everyone gets that guess some of it depends on how far apart the hate this stuff is from another baby yay me personally am not fond of the baby years but do hate it either it just is my forte spaced my kids waaayyy the heck out because the baby years are so bad for me that sort of need to get over it like the exhaustion and isolation and general difficult ness of it before can even bother to *think* about even having another kid have an 11yo 6yo and 6month old the 6month old has by and large been the hardest for me yet he will be my last hubs and have opted for permanent birth control and that that but in between each definitely went through phases of feeling like was done having kids never wanted to do that ever again birth nursing diapers crying sleep loss whatever but then as the kids get older all of that sort of just fades away and kids get in my opinion so much easier and way more fun and more fulfilling aspect of life again all of this is just my experience and opinion good question ve been wondering too because they love them they think it worth it in the long run they think it ll get better when they re older they think babies are cute it easier and more socially acceptable to complain than be happy it meaningful even though it difficult they want their kid to have sibling etc etc everyone has their own reasons also sex happens and brings surprises honestly complain about lot of things hate running but like having done it so keep running even though every time get like mile from my house think wtf am doing hate doing dishes but like cooking so the cleanup is worth it hate flying but like going to new places sometimes you complain about things that are necessary or part of bigger better thing because in the moment you are not enjoying that one thing it does mean just going to stop running cooking traveling think of omg so tired and there is food all over my house as the equivalent of omg guys my flight to tahiti is delayed and stuck in newark it feels very bad in the moment but it is totally worth it for the whole trip well because they re worth all of that my daughter turns three next week and we ve just began trying again don love it honestly love my daughter more than anything in the world but parenting is hard and have anxiety so why am having another because know it all worth it and do not want my daughter to be an only child had blog on myspace yes super old where would vent laugh about my three kids under four friends wife commented one day that she read it every day and thought it was hilarious but it made her not want to have kids told her that the terrible things they do are often the funniest and the things that everyone can relate to you don need to have child to realize that one year old smearing butter all over her carpet is bad but there are so many good points that simply can be put into words everyone knows being exhausted but it hard to describe sitting in the rocking chair with your sleeping baby or walking in to your husband giving the baby bottle at 1:00am or having easter at because the kids woke up too early and found their presents they are big now my 16 year old just got bumped from the varsity running team because he had cold and had one bad race ranting and furious that they wouldn take the whole season into account my amazing boy is excited for the runner who is replacing him because he has worked so hard and my so just going to push harder at the jv meet and get medal seeing him as mature and compassionate young man nearly brought me to tears the little things you see in them as they grow are so amazing think some people also just get caught in the quagmire of constant complaining have few relatives like this it how the converse never hear what good only what bad so these constant complainers might actually be really happy and have 90 good and only 10 bad in their lives but we only get to hear about the bad so we think they re miserable was one and done until my oldest started begging for sister she even jimmied up trap in her room and wanted to invite one of her friends and his baby sister over so she could trap the baby and keep it couldn hold up against that and knowing that my husband wanted more but wasn pressuring me tipped it over into let just do it kind of regret the choice partly because turns out big sister isn so keen on sharing and had very different idea of what having sibling would be like and partly because there such gap between the two that feel like could be doing so much more if hadn gone back to wrangling toddler she is an adorable little demon though and full of personality do love her to bits but objectively things would be at least bit better without her exactly this is valid question knew woman who had extreme post partum depression she didn want to get out of bed and was constantly handing off her son to relatives for the poor kids first year constantly complained about how she wanted to go back to work how she isn cut out for this etc then at about year and half has another kid and then another and then another four kids all under going from daycares to babysitters to grandmas house two have developmental issues and all because mom but im also woman need to have life it fucking mind boggling on the opposite end get so much hate because don want anymore kids due to my mental state our financial state and just the fact that having kids is really tough and just don think could do another any time say anything like done having kids cause get some sort of reply like you don mean that you are so young knew someone like this once but sure her babies were all accident babies as mom of four if say too many good things about the kids it bragging and it obnoxious would love to tell everybody all about how amazing my kids are how much they make me laugh the things they are good at etc but too much of that and it makes me insufferable lol so talk to my mother because grandmas love that stuff also infants kind of suck at least imo lol was referring to things like oh hey we re having moving sell because we re getting evicted and month later pregnant please contribute to this gofundme well first people tend to rant more than they rave so they spend lot of time complaining but that does mean that they do actually have lot of good times or that the good does outweigh the bad then do discount the number of couples who were exactly planning another one although sure there also significant number who were being super careful either now obviously those couples have options but most of the time they continue the pregnancy there also the people who have more kids because they feel they need to give their current child ren siblings even though they do particularly want additional children for themselves or the people who think having second child will somehow make things better for whatever reason this one boggles my mind honey if your husband sucked with your first he gon na continue to suck do care what he says so yeah those are the most common reasons see one done myself though referring to people complaining about how they do know where their next meal is coming from or how they re going to pay the electric bill and then they announce they ve been trying for baby and are finally pregnant or people asking for resources to domestic violence shelter and few months later announce their planned child no idea as would never ask but mean surely birth control failure ca be that common right do mean people complaining about baby related things mean people saying they ca pay their rent ca afford clothes for work spouse might lose their job etc and then announce that they re trying for baby not referring to people complaining about baby things mean people who have one child and complain that they can not afford rent food utilities and then have one after another without changing any other circumstances my guess is because people who are reaponsible or aware enough to get their lives together to pay rent on time to discipline the children they have also are responsible or aware enough to use borth control effectively as someone struggling with fertility issues it one more anguishing way life is unfair for me it was rough for almost months but that when my son started sleeping through the night sleeping through the night solved so many problems financial stability takes long term planning so does birth control kinda natural if you re irresponsible with money it not too hard to imagine you might be irresponsible in other aspects of life of course they probably are all oops babies there are plenty of posts about relationship problems in the trying to conceive sub ll tell you why that happened to me my first husband and our two kids moved from arizona to washington state had no money at all so little money that we qualified for food stamps cash benefits and gas vouchers my husband found tech support job after just weeks but we had to move into an apartment and get out of the single room we were all staying in at my mom place absolutely no money but we finally had privacy this lead to my third pregnancy we did have money for any form of birth control but figured we were safe since our youngest was years old and it took us year and lot of trying to conceive him it was hilarious my doctor told me the likely conception date was november 1st the day we moved into our new apartment lmao it sounds like psychological problem ve known people like this and it makes me so sad for the kids it like the couples that do this have at least one person who is very codependent usually the woman but it can be the man as well they are usually also narcissist the child brings them more attention and also someone that is dependent on them when you are very very poor another kid does impact finances all that much you have medicaid at least for the kids which covers pretty much everything at 100 daycare subsidy if you work or are in school full time food stamps wic for formula and food these resources actually become more abundant when you add another dependent to the mix so logistically can see why someone would choose to have another kid when they re really poor some people just love to complain that it and if you ve been sympathetic ear in the past it all you ll hear from them you might never hear no much they actually love being parent at anything really because they enjoy complaining so much also wonder if maybe sometimes people enjoy the excitement hope and positive attention that pregnancy and new baby brings because if their life is sucky it would make sense to want to look forward to something and having baby is something they already know how to do at least feel that way pregnancy would be something exciting and new to break the monotony and add some positive vibes well the domestic violence ones the woman may actually be in an abusive relationship sometimes it is really hard to leave one even if you realize it is bad for you it possible those people leave realize they are pregnant and then go back to the abuser because they think it will change something or they want the baby to have dad or something along those lines for me it was the first months absolutely awful but now we re at months and can make him laugh and he is absolutely fascinated with grabbing things and he chatters back when you give him place to speak do worry you ll see the light at the end of tunnel that first smile that is gas pains is just ugh so have you ever seen an artist or writer tearing their hair out over project or how about athletes pushing themselves and going through hell to get that much better lots of things are simultaneously distressing uncomfortable or down right miserable but still very rewarding more coming than you think http americanpregnancy org preventing pregnancy birth control failure we re at almost months and found the first months to absolutely be the hardest so far now things are pretty chill and fun but those first omg absolutely brutal it got better so fast after he hit that mark didn mean to used reliable birth control iud it failed removed that kind of horrifying people talking about their birth control failing not the subsequent kids removed one of the first words from my toddler was cackie which means coffee because we do go to the playground until after mom and dad have coffee in the morning it gets better my first baby had colic and cried constantly and had ppd my husband worked constantly so felt like single parent it was not cool it was rough few years but glad about it now can image life without the little turd say he was stubborn and determined to make his place in the work from day these comments are making feel lot better am currently laying in bed because finally got my daughter to sleep and do want to move in case she wakes up on one hand cuddles and no screaming for the past hour on the other really do have things to do that do involve laying in bed all day have year old and it just keeps getting better and better there will be new challenges but they are worth it and you will get some you time eventually we did one and done omg have the exact same feelings there is years between my boys we ve struggled with lot of the same issues my oldest was super excited but now that his younger either is now toddler he is pre teen that wants to play independently plus it was like being first time mom all over again everything changed plus we had taste of freedom with getting one out of the toddler years and then we went back to sleepless nights and toddler wrangling but boy and glad they get to have sibling they truely love each other at the end of the day enjoy your oh my goodness it doesn just get better it becomes the best thing today my two year old and were taking nap together to let me know he was done sleeping he rolled over grabbed my face very sweetly and fast now am million weeks pregnant with number two and dreading those first few months that will inevitably come any day now it gets better everyone keeps telling me enjoy this time it only gets harder about the first couple months are they crazy hope so the exhaustion is no joke did transatlantic flight with one year old going through sleep regression we were the only two non jet lagged people on the trip family reunion because she baby and bounces back and was just so used to being that tired finances are major source of stress for lot of people regardless of childrearing and we know the first year or so after have baby is the most miserable time for couple maybe try to redirect to something positive when you notice the topics have been negative if there one thing ve learned it that other people reproductive decisions have not single thing to do with me why do you care not trying to sound snarky but for real suppose it depends on your kiddos temperament my little man is up and tears am not sure if even took more than showers the whole three months was on maternity leave got ta love that zombie mom state my coworkers are always so grumpy in the morning and walk in birth control failure baby was only months post back surgery and the best guess is that all the medicine was on and trauma to my body kind of did work on my favor haha no they crazy mean ca speak to the teenage years since my kid is but nothing so far has come close to how hard those first few months were some people just have easy newborns and or village of extended family helping them those people are the worst honestly like completely 100 honestly because people have an easier time talking about negatives than positives you re physically and mentally drained and that why you ca change your mindset anymore but deep inside you still want to have more kids because you do enjoy the journey eviction can be sudden planning family can take years why should someone let temporary financial setback affect what they want for their family if it fiscal irresponsibility you are commenting about you re ignoring multiple social factors about access to birth control abortion and healthcare potential dv situations and ultimately person own autonomy it comes across as poor people should have kids tbh have wondered this myself and also didn want to risk sounding judgy by asking the same question but see people post about yelling at their kids and sometimes posts glorifying the fact the parents yell at their kids and wonder why they had so many if they re going to be yelling at them know mom who has that is amazing and super kind and wonderful so this isn comment about not having kids it about knowing your limit and not being miserable and not treating your kids like they re burden have one child and ve never yelled at her and we have very gentle loving environment for her ve also made conscious decision not to have more than because know my limits babies are different for me nothing has compared to the first few months in terms of exhaustion for sure but personally the month period has been the hardest so far my guy is 10 months now and up until last month still woke up times night coupled with pulling himself up to stand when he was months old it was really whole different level of frustration he was literally always in danger as he kept climbing and falling and that all he ever wanted to do so my—no his—waking minutes were spent with me just constantly by his side not really playing with him but not really minding my own business either from baby who was logical thinking that can bring people financial woes can also lead them to think that if one condom is good two at time is even better it way worse there are some really not bright people out there this is encouraging last night was my first night home from the hospital with my daughter and so damn tired she was fussing all night and wouldn sleep just have to ride it out and enjoy it guess how do other mothers function on zero sleep hated being parent for the first months it does get better and smiling is the start for me being parent got easier when could see my baby enjoyed things think really started to love it when my daughter started sitting up and playing alone she standing now and will be walking soon who knows if will enjoy this next stage but it million times better than newborns wish could just birth all of my children already at months old urgh remember googling how to give child up for adoption at am crying nursing my newborn she the best child in the world lol sleepy people do crazy stuff newborns suck you do function you just survive if your breastfeeding the it should start becoming easier at weeks that was huge turning point for me by weeks they drain the breast way faster and so your back in bed sooner another huge breakthrough accepting dummy huge breakthrough in those early months this is what makes the biggest differences if your bottle feeding then get some movies you wan na watch in order when your baby wakes in the night and your making bottle put the movie on then the next time they wake watch abit more then the next time the ending it makes it abit easier to get up in the night when you know you get to carry on watching something cool it harder in different ways like when you have to repeatedly stop your kid from hurting themselves or trying to eat something they should there are lot of reasons why care but what provoked this post is that was chatting with people who were doing statistics and case tracking for cps many cases were 10+ years old because people kept having kids and losing them to the state was told it was common then got to thinking failure no but laziness with it in ltr or marriage think that much more common exactly this bottle fed so set up my bottles ahead of time good bottle warmer is heaven binged all of lost in space all of 13 reasons why all of skin wars all of harlots netflix and hulu were godsend say goodbye to sleep for little while but it ll come back we re down to one feeding at night at around am then he hungry at am but he down again until about am you ll survive promise for me in that boat my husband and live pay check to paycheck but always have enough to get by but we are not able to save any money and if something breaks we struggle to figure out how to pay for it that being said we are pregnant with our third child we were planning on it but we were preventing as sick of birth control side effects we are also now on my husbands insurance which sucks compared to my insurance we are looking at 3700 alone in ob fees and that is not including any hospital fees that puts us at needing 620ish dollars month for the next months in order to pay all money issues aside
